languages.text: If an enemy suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} from one of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s allies, at the start of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, a new {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} is created on that enemy on whichever side is closest to the Assassin.
languages.original_text: Если противник получил {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g} от союзника {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасина{/g}, то в начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} ассасина {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}слабое место{/g} этого противника окажется на ближайшей к ассасину стороне.

traits.locale_text: If an enemy suffers a critical hit from the Assassin's ally, at the start of the Assassin's turn, a new opening is created on the side of that enemy that is closest to the Assassin.
If an enemy suffers a critical hit from one of the Assassin's allies, at the start of the Assassin's turn, a new opening is created on that enemy on whichever side is closest to the Assassin.

If an enemy suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} from one of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s allies, at the start of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, a new {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} is created on that enemy on whichever side is closest to the Assassin.

If an enemy suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} from one of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s allies, at the start of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, a new {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} is created on that enemy on whichever side is closest to the Assassin.

languages.text: Если противник получил {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g} от союзника {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасина{/g}, то в начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} ассасина {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}слабое место{/g} этого противника окажется на ближайшей к ассасину стороне.
languages.original_text: If an enemy suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} from one of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s allies, at the start of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, a new {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} is created on that enemy on whichever side is closest to the Assassin.

traits.locale_text: Если противник получил критическое попадание от союзника ассасина, то в начале хода ассасина слабое место этого противника окажется на ближайшей к ассасину стороне.
Если противник получил критическое попадание от союзника ассасина, то в начале хода ассасина слабое место этого противника окажется на ближайшей к ассасину стороне.

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}的队友对敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}之后，刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，该名敌人最靠近刺客的一侧会出现一处新的{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}破绽{/g}。
languages.original_text: If an enemy suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} from one of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s allies, at the start of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, a new {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} is created on that enemy on whichever side is closest to the Assassin.

traits.locale_text: 当刺客的队友对敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}之后，刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，该名敌人最靠近刺客的一侧会出现一处新的破绽。

languages.text: Si un enemigo sufre un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} causado por uno de los aliados del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g}, al comienzo del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del asesino se abre una nueva {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}zona desprotegida{/g} en el lado de ese enemigo que esté más próximo al asesino.
languages.original_text: If an enemy suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} from one of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s allies, at the start of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, a new {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} is created on that enemy on whichever side is closest to the Assassin.

traits.locale_text: Si un enemigo sufre un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} causado por uno de los aliados del asesino, al comienzo del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del asesino se abre una nueva zona desprotegida en el lado de ese enemigo que esté más próximo al asesino.

languages.text: Wenn ein Gegner einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} von einem Verbündeten des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassinen{/g} erleidet, entsteht zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Assassinen eine neue {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}Blöße{/g} bei diesem Gegner auf der Seite, die dem Assassinen am nächsten ist.
languages.original_text: If an enemy suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} from one of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s allies, at the start of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, a new {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} is created on that enemy on whichever side is closest to the Assassin.

traits.locale_text: Wenn ein Gegner einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} von einem Verbündeten des Assassinen erleidet, entsteht zu Beginn der {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} des Assassinen eine neue Blöße bei diesem Gegner auf der Seite, die dem Assassinen am nächsten ist.

languages.text: Si au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassin{/g}, l'un de ses alliés inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} à un ennemi, une nouvelle {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}brèche{/g} est créée sur cet ennemi, sur le flanc le plus proche de l'assassin.
languages.original_text: If an enemy suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} from one of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s allies, at the start of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, a new {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} is created on that enemy on whichever side is closest to the Assassin.

traits.locale_text: Si au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'Assassin, un de ses alliés inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} à un ennemi, une nouvelle brèche est créée sur cet ennemi, sur le flanc le plus proche de l'Assassin.

languages.text: 敵が{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}の味方1人から{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を受けた場合、アサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に、その敵のアサシンに近い方の側に新しい{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}隙{/g}を作り出す。
languages.original_text: If an enemy suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} from one of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s allies, at the start of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, a new {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} is created on that enemy on whichever side is closest to the Assassin.

traits.locale_text: 敵がアサシンの味方1人から{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を受けた場合、アサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に、その敵のアサシンに近い方の側に新しい隙を作り出す。
